      public Request findRequestByAddress​(java.lang.Long idItsc)
      Find out the Request which contains the intersection having the same identity of its parameter
      Parameters:
      idItsc - the identity of the intersection
      Returns:
      the object Request containing the specific intersection, null if the demanding request wasn't found

    • getDuration

      public int getDuration​(java.lang.Long idItsc)
      Get the duration corresponding to the request which contains the intersection having the same identity of its parameter
      Parameters:
      idItsc - the identity of the intersection
      Returns:
      the integer time in second, -1 if the demanding request wasn't found

    • researchTypeIntersection

      public java.lang.String researchTypeIntersection​(java.lang.Long id)
      Get intersection type from requests
      Parameters:
      id - intersection id
      Returns:
      intersection type can be either "Delivery" or "Pickup"
